title: flyboynyc
author: flyboynyc
content: Hi, so I have two different machines mining XMR to the same wallet address. I was comparing the payouts and happen to find that I have 3+ payouts of the same type. Please see the pictures attached. Can some1 explain why this happened or whats happening? I wouldn't think i'd have same transactions on different miners. https://ibb.co/PjD0hcc

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: You should move this to the altcoin mining section this section is for Bitcoin mining support.I think you are pointing to the reward being sent to the same wallet?The image shows both miners mining on the same blocks so I think you are pointing to the rewards that are on the same transaction.I think that's normal if both miners mined in the same block you should still be rewarded depending on how many shares you submit.

comments.author: flyboynyc
comments.body: But they are 2 different miners, different hash rate. I don't think its 2 different transactions(i wish was it was). I'm going to test it out more and see what happens.
